column5: I am not a video game or board game playing person [ atleast up til now ] but i was wondering if there was such a thing like fishing games . I watched peolpe play the nascar thing a time or two . Sitting here now with winter ahead i  thought , what if , a fishing game that could be played on computer , better yet on a web site with friends as a pass time thru the winter months . A game sorts like the nascar game but for fishing in the same way its played , pick your lake or river , pick your boat , rod , bait , lure , fishing buddy ect ...  I think it would be better if it could be played with a large number people at the same time tho . If there is not such a thing i would be interested in getting together with a few guys sharing ideas and inventing one . Then may be this could just be a stupid thought , then again may be theres some money to be made  ?
Shure ! ...... but what if for the other days and for those who can't ?

there are games out there already.. http://news.cnet.com/8301-17938_105-10225228-1.html  http://games.teamxbox.com/xbox/996/Rapala-Pro-Fishing/  never tried them though!  and there might be more...  thanks

In terms of fishing board games. I own the Walleye tournament board, its a trivia game that is set up like a walleye tournament highest amount of fish at weigh-in wins basically.  I love it but sadly most don't want to join me in playing the game at the cottage. I am going to a father/son/boys ice fishing weekend at the end of January and am thinking I will bring it.
Isn't winter the busy season for snowplowing?
Sure is Roy , theres roughly 150 days of winter , 30 or so of them are plow days , what do we do when its not snowing ? We come here to see what every one's doing i think .
Sure!
We had several that went around.... not all fishing though....  Here is an example..  http://www.albinoblacksheep.com/games/pingu2
Some of us, still play table top hockey.
Lot of us i think grew up playing games in the house in the winter , with nine kids in our house i think it helped our parents stay sane while we were all couped up in side .
PEWF 9 kids,oh I forgot,yer french   . My nan(mudders side) had 18.7 girls and 11 byes. Someone, was playing a winter game.   Dam NEWFS.
18.7 girls , i don't want to say theres one of those in every family because theres not , but some familys do get one ...... lol . My grand papy & mamy had 24 , 22 survived .

Last year I got this game for Christmas. It's probably the best fishing game I've played, and even has a special controller with it:            Considering the ice has decided to come and go and who knows if it's coming back, I may have to dust this thing off, myself.
Not wanting to offend any one , but i liked to steer this thread back towards finding out what folks think about being able to play a fishing game online ............... Ron
Wow , thats awsome Dana , i am lost for word on that one , Wow does that ever look real ..... Wow , i'd be interested in playing some thing like that .
There sure is Dan , just wondering tho more about playing one on line with people you know .
Does this come in a lefty model?
Reel arm is reversible... lol
If it isn't a baitcaster then I WON'T use it....   Art
I don't know every thing Art but i'd say it looks like multi purpose does'nt Dana .......lol .
Any one in here playing ?
